detailsData.title: Our Clients Win
detailsData.content: Over the last 10 years 98% of our clients have recovered compensation for their pain, suffering, and financial losses. That is true for automobile and bicycle accidents, medical malpractice, Kaiser claims, brain injury and paralysis, wrongful death, defective products, and every kind of case we handle.

detailsData.title: Over $1 Billion Recovered
detailsData.content: We Get Results. Through the years we have recovered more than one billion dollars on behalf of clients injured through the wrongful conduct of others. We have prevailed and recovered money for clients injured in a multitude of circumstances.

detailsData.title: No Upfront Fees
detailsData.content: We are a 100% contingency fee firm. We charge no upfront fees or retainers for investigation or expert reviews. We advance the money to investigate, file, prosecute, and where necessary, try our client’s cases. No recovery, no fee.

detailsData.title: We Try Cases
detailsData.content: While most cases settle, some cases need to be tried for our clients to recover full value. Insurance companies and major corporations will not pay full value of a case if they are not afraid of the plaintiff’s lawyer in trial. We win in trial; judges and defense lawyers know that. Our team of injury attorneys have been honored as “Trial Lawyer of the Year” by the San Francisco Trial Lawyers Association and the California Chapter of the American Board of Trial Advocates.

address: 650 California St, 26th Floor, San Francisco, CA 94108
subHeading: Most awarded law firm in Northern California
valueProp: Established in 1959, Walkup, Melodia, Kelly & Schoenberger is one of the premier personal injury firms in the United States. For more than 60 years, we have proudly represented clients in the San Francisco bay area and across the country for personal injuries they have suffered due to the negligence of others. We understand the hardships that can come with an unexpected serious injury, and we are committed to pursuing the compensation you need to make a full recovery.

testimonalData.text: Doug Saeltzer & Kelly Ganci are professional experts that assisted me through the hardest moments of my life. I'd recommend the Walkup Firm to anyone dealing with a personal injury. CHAMPIONS!
testimonalData.author: Barry H.

testimonalData.text: We recently resolved our case thanks to the professional and personal manner provided by Richard Schoenberger at Walkup, Melodia, Kelly & Schoenberger Law Offices.
testimonalData.author: Suzanne A.

testimonalData.text: From the moment Rich took over my case, he worked like a bull. Not only is he an excellent lawyer, working hard for his clients, he is extremely personable with a great sense of humor.
testimonalData.author: Kerry B.
